channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Bulk Page Creator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Bulk Page Creator

item.title: CVE-2022-1611|2024-08-03T00:10:03.748Z -- unknown -- bulk%20page%20creator
item.description: The Bulk Page Creator WordPress plugin before 1.1.4 does not protect its page creation functionalities with nonce checks, which makes them vulnerable to CSRF.
